root.name: Secret of the Magic Crystals
root.description: OverviewDeveloped by Artery Studios and produced in Unity 3D, Secret of the Magic Crystals was released on 3rd February, 2010. With the choice of playing as either boy or girl, the player's role is based around the nurturing and breeding of a variety of horses, as well as legendary creatures, such as the unicorn and Pegasus.GameplaySecret of the Magic Crystals revolves around breeding, training, and taking part in a broad range of activities with the player's selection of horses and mythical creatures. Provided with the choice of four activity courses involving rhythm-based movement, as well as five difficulty levels, your horse or creature will grow in strength, speed, and stamina, ready to take on many different quests and tournaments.There are also a wide range of buildings to upgrade and make use of, such as allowing the player to fit their breeds with magical horseshoes, and conjuring up magical potions using ingredients found throughout the game.System RequirementsPCOS: Microsoft Windows XP (Service Pack 2), Vista, 7Processor: Pentium 4, 1.4 GHz or equivalentMemory: 512 MB System MemoryGraphics: DirectX9 Compliant Video Card with support for Shaders Version 1.1, 64 MB VRAMDirectXÂ®: DirectX 9.0cHard Drive: 300 MB Free Hard Drive SpaceSound: Direct Sound Compliant Audio CardOther: Monitor that supports a resolution of 1024x768x32MacOS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8, Snow Leopard 10.6.3, or laterProcessor: Intel-based Macintosh 2.0 GHzMemory: 512 MB System MemoryGraphics: NVidia or ATI-based Video CardHard Drive: 2 GB Free Hard Drive SpaceOther: Monitor that supports a resolution of 1024x768x32
